text: Seth Doane is an American television journalist. He works for CBS News. He started his career at WNYW, New York City's Fox affiliate, as a field producer. In 2006, CNN hired Doane as a special video news correspondent for South Asia. In August 2007, he became a national correspondent for CBS News. From 2013 to 2016, he covered events in Asia for CBS News. Since 2016, he has been covering Europe, Africa and the Middle East for CBS News. Doane lives in Rome. He is married to Andrea Pastorelli.
